TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ClassLoader extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Loads classes and resources from a repository.

remarks.para: Loads classes and resources from a repository. One or more class loaders are installed at runtime. These are consulted whenever the runtime system needs a specific class that is not yet available in-memory. Typically, class loaders are grouped into a tree where child class loaders delegate all requests to parent class loaders. Only if the parent class loader cannot satisfy the request, the child class loader itself tries to handle it.

ClassLoader is an abstract class that implements the common infrastructure required by all class loaders. Android provides several concrete implementations of the class, with being the one typically used. Other applications may implement subclasses of ClassLoader to provide special ways for loading classes.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Class LoadClass(string className) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the class to look for.
Docs.summary: Loads the class with the specified name.

remarks.para: Loads the class with the specified name. Invoking this method is equivalent to calling loadClass(className, false).
Note: In the Android reference implementation, the second parameter of is ignored anyway.

Docs.exception: if the class can not be found.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual Java.Lang.Class LoadClass (string className, bool resolve);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Class LoadClass(string className, bool resolve) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the class to look for.
Docs.summary: Loads the class with the specified name, optionally linking it after loading.

remarks.para:
Loads the class with the specified name, optionally linking it after loading. The following steps are performed:
Call to determine if the requested class has already been loaded.
If the class has not yet been loaded: Invoke this method on the parent class loader.
If the class has still not been loaded: Call to find the class.
Note: In the Android reference implementation, the resolve parameter is ignored; classes are never linked.

Docs.exception: if the class can not be found.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
